scriptLines:
postSQLs:['delete from Raw_LinkedinContent where 
date in (select distinct date from Temp_Raw_LinkedinContent where date is not null)','insert Raw_LinkedinContent
select * from Temp_Raw_LinkedinContent','delete from Changemakers_Combined_Overview where sub_channel = 'Linkedin Organic' and date >= (select cast(dateadd(day, -35, max(date)) as date) from Temp_Raw_LinkedinContent)','insert into Changemakers_Combined_Overview (channel,sub_channel,content, date, month, month_year, week, day_week, week_type, time_day, impressions, users,likes_consid_engage, shares,comments,total_engagements,conversion_total_clicks)
select
    'Social Media' as 'channel'
    ,'Linkedin Organic' as 'sub_channel'
    , null
          , rlc.date as date
    , datename(month, rlc.date) as month
    , concat(datename(month, rlc.date), ' ', year(rlc.date)) as month_year
    , concat(datename(month, rlc.date), ' ', year(rlc.date), ' Week ', (DATEPART(week, rlc.date) - DATEPART(week, DATEADD(day, 1, EOMONTH(rlc.date, -1)))) + 1) as week
    , datename(dw, rlc.date) as day_week
    , case when datename(dw, rlc.date) in ('Saturday', 'Sunday') then 'Weekend' else 'Weekday' end as week_type
    , 'Unspecified' as time_day
    , rlc.impressions_total as impressions
    , rlc.impressions_total as users
    , rlc.reactions_total as likes_consid_engage
    , rlc.reposts_total as shares
    , rlc.comments_total as comments
    , (rlc.reactions_total + rlc.reposts_total + rlc.comments_total + rlc.clicks_total) as total_engagements
    , rlc.clicks_total as conversion_total_clicks
--    , case when rlc.impressions_total = 0 then 0 else (cast(rlc.clicks_total as decimal) / cast(rlc.impressions_total as decimal) * 100) end as click_through_rate  
from Raw_LinkedinContent rlc
left outer join Raw_LinkedinVisitors rlv on rlc.date = rlv.date
where rlc.date >= (select cast(dateadd(day, -35, max(date)) as date) from Temp_Raw_LinkedinContent);','drop table if exists Temp_Raw_LinkedinContent;'],
